website_summaries.verdict: This party-worthy is great for gatherings and special events, but stands out more for its cute design than the performance it delivers.
pros: Has an eye-catching Tiki design with bright, festive colors
A decorative option that goes well with party decor
cons: On-off switch is in an awkward location
Doesn't produce a lot of bubbles at once, or shoot them very far

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute But Messy
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright beautiful design of this and have received rave reviews! Everything deserves a 5 star, but because of the mess it makes with the bubbles leaking out of the holder and killing our tablecloth, I gave it 3. I solved it by putting a piece of whiteboard under it to elevate it but couldn't get it to stop leaking. Will still keep using and figure out a better system of absorbing!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley S.

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I didn't give it one star is that the tiki frame part that covers the machine is nice and is able to be removed
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The bubble machine didn't work to blow bubbles as expected. Instead leaked & was a mess. The only reason I didn't give it one star is that the tiki frame part that covers the machine is nice and is able to be removed after we threw away the useless machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy  Quamme

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters birthday party. The product is cheaply made. The four plastic stands that the motor sits on kept popping off and in turn, didn’t provide the proper clearance for the bubbles to flow out of the Tiki’s mouth clearly. When you would pull the Tiki head off the motor to re-adjust the motor stand, the legs would fall off again as you tried setting the Tiki opening at the bottom over the stand. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: R. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: horrible mess
customer_reviews.text: This bubble blower is horrible. I ordered it for a Luau themed kids birthday party, and it does look cute cute. However the bubble machine portion doesnt blow bubbles very well. It creates a mountain of suds, and they pile up on the mouth of the Tiki. The $10 basic bubble blower from Target produces many more bubbles and was more fun for my kids than this one. This was way too expensive to work so poorly.
customer_reviews.author: MJDolphin

customer_reviews.title: The motor doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The little black motor doesn’t work and put batteries in t. Trash
customer_reviews.author: Thelma  Allen-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Do not wate your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This bubble blower is a waste of money. It blows bubbles that get stuck on the save and form a puddle of bubble meds right where it sits. This was a huge dissappointnent! If I could give it no stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this item from the minute I took it out of the box. One of the plastic legs on the bubble machine was broken off and there were no instructions on how to operate it. I tried glueing the leg on but that didn't work, so I used duct tape. When I poured the bubble liquid in it just leaked right out of the bottom. I looked at this same item at Party City and it was packaged exactly the same...no instructions and the leg was even broken!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!! A horrible purchase! It spits out a few bubbles at a time & makes a terrible mess. I bought a $10 Gazillion bubble machine for my niece that works 100 times better. I got this for myself for camping get togethers & they wanted $38 plus tax!! It's an embarassment to use. They'd do well to just sell the Tiki Head separately & have the customer buy a workable bubble machine to go in it. Which I will now have to do. Awful!!! Do not buy unless you want to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my room because it looked awesome and bubbles are flat out fun. But this thing is terrible. There is no easy way to access the on/off switch because you need to take the tiki head off the mount to change the setting. The head doesn't even fit smoothly on the mount either. The bubbles shoot about 8" and then start to foam out of the tiki's mouth like it has rabies. What a horrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wmrt167

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it for bubble party not a foam party
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, this thing made a sudsy mess. I was able to get it going for 2 minutes and then the suds enveloped the entire blower section. Bought this at Party City for $35. Will be returning this to Party City.
customer_reviews.author: Arash S.

product_meta.title: Amscan 393096 Tiki Party Bubble Machine, 1 piece
product_meta.description: Have your summer party ambience Delivered straight from the mouth of a tiki God! Tiki bubble machine blows a steady steam of bubbles through a hole in its mouth for hours on end.
feature_bullets: Bubble machine in colorful faux wood tiki idol design measures 12.25" x 8 3/8 x 8.25"
Have your summer party ambience delivered straight from the mouth of a tiki god!
Batteries and bubble solution not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars20 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
